constraints: Backend must use Motoko single-actor architecture only; no Python, Flask, or external ML libraries can be deployed
ML model training, SHAP analysis, and Python-based functionality cannot be implemented on the Internet Computer platform
All ML metrics, SHAP visualizations, and model comparisons must use mock data or pre-generated static assets
Frontend must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS exclusively
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or components/ui directory
Real-time features, WebSockets, and external database connections are not supported
nonGoals: Actual Random Forest model training or deployment
Live SHAP TreeExplainer integration or dynamic explanation generation
Python Flask backend or any Python code execution
Real machine learning pipeline with scikit-learn or similar libraries
Integration with external ML APIs or services
Synthetic dataset generation with rule-based logic (use mock data instead)
Train-test split or actual model evaluation metrics
Real-time bias analysis or statistical computations
Deployment to Render, Railway, or AWS (Internet Computer deployment only)
Gunicorn, Procfile, or Flask-specific deployment configurations
